title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2974/87 of 2 October 1987 remedying the prejudice caused by the halting of fishing by all Community vessels of sand eel and Norway pout in the waters of ICES division IV (Norwegian waters) in 1987
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2974/87
of 2 October 1987
remedying the prejudice caused by the halting of fishing by all Community vessels of sand eel and Norway pout in the waters of ICES division IV (Norwegian waters) in 1987
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 October 1987.
For the Commission
Antรณnio CARDOSO E CUNHA
